description: Episode of Series "Four corners (Television program)" "Is this the way for future factories?" Documentary about a different sort of factory in the USA - Sol Air Corp - where there are no foremen or organised workforce, no production targets, average wages but many staff benefits including cheap petrol, medical and dental schemes and recreational facilities.
